title: win10 game always lagging
body: when I'm play lol with my win10 computer, that always lagging, and my friend plays with his macbook, his ping is good, we are using the same internet. the vision is 7.15, could some one help me to solve this problem?

replies.body: Your specific network through your own pc might be having some instability or blocks causing packet loss.  Let's find out for sure by running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  Let me know what results you get and we'll go from there.
